1.0.0.name: wordpress/multi-cloud-file-download
1.0.0.description: The StorageMadeEasy Multi-Cloud File Download plug-in enables you to share files for download, via a widget, for over 30 cloud storage providers. These include Amazon S3, RackSpace Cloud Files, Box.net, Microsoft Live SkyDrive, Gmail, any POP3 or IMAP enabled email account, and any FTP server directory.
